TITLE: Configuring Assets for Machine Insight Dashboards
DESCRIPTION: Steps to configure assets in Machine Insight for which machine data dashboards should be generated, based on the asset structure defined in IIH Essentials.
SOURCE: https://github.com/industrial-edge/machine-insight-getting-started/blob/main/docs/Installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
- switch to tab 'Configuration' within the left-side menu
- click 'Go to Asset Configuration'
- navigate to the asset for which you want to create a dashboard
- click 'Find parameter' to assign the belonging machine status variable
- select the dedicated status mapping via the drop down box
- save the settings
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Databus User and Topic in Industrial Edge Management
DESCRIPTION: Steps to create a Databus user and topic for exchanging data between PLC and IED via SIMATIC S7+ Connector. This configuration is done in the Industrial Edge Management interface.
SOURCE: https://github.com/industrial-edge/machine-insight-getting-started/blob/main/docs/Installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
- open the Industrial Edge Management (IEM)
- go to 'Data Connections' > Databus
- select the corresponding IED and launch
- create a new user (`edge`/`edge`) with the dedicated topic `ie/#` and set the permissions to 'Publish and Subscribe'
- deploy the configuration and wait for the job to be finished successfully
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Status Mapping in Machine Insight
DESCRIPTION: Steps to create a status mapping for machine states in Machine Insight, which is used to visualize the status in a Gantt chart.
SOURCE: https://github.com/industrial-edge/machine-insight-getting-started/blob/main/docs/Installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
- switch to tab 'Configuration' within the left-side menu
- click 'Go to Status mappings' and create a new mapping
- enter a name and a description (optional)
- setup the mapping by assigning each value of the machine status to a dedicated text label with unique color
- save the mapping
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring SIMATIC S7+ Connector Databus Credentials
DESCRIPTION: Steps to configure the Databus credentials for the SIMATIC S7+ Connector using the Common Configurator app on the Industrial Edge Device web interface.
SOURCE: https://github.com/industrial-edge/machine-insight-getting-started/blob/main/docs/Installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
- open the IED web interface
- open the app Common Configurator
- go to the tab 'Settings' and select the menu 'Databus credentials'
- enter the databus service name: `ie-databus:1883`
- in tab 'Data Publisher settings' enter the databus user name and password (`edge`/`edge`)
- in tab 'Data Subscriber settings' enter the databus user name and password (`edge`/`edge`)
- save the settings
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring IIH Essentials Databus Settings
DESCRIPTION: Steps to configure the Databus settings in IIH Essentials for gathering process data from the SIMATIC S7+ Connector.
SOURCE: https://github.com/industrial-edge/machine-insight-getting-started/blob/main/docs/Installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
- go to the tab 'Settings' and select 'Databus settings'
- enter the databus service name: `ie-databus:1883`
- enter the user name and password (`edge`/`edge`) and save
- go to the tab 'Connectors'
- select the 'SIMATIC S7 Plus Connector'
- activate and save
```
